snippet.title: Creating my own AVATAR Fan Game! | 1000+ Hrs of Development in 11 Mins! | [Day 100] [Dreams PS4]
snippet.description:
Elca Gaming is creating a fan-made Avatar Game called “Four Seasons”  inspired by The Last Airbender Timeline in Dreams PS4/PS5 by Media Molecule.

In this Video I share our Progress from Day 1 to 100.
Feel free to share this Video, a ton of work went into this. :)

Play the latest playable Version (v.0.70) in Dreams on PlayStation:
https://indreams.me/dream/mBvDfqnfNbN

What does a "Day" represent?
In the Early Videos it was literally a Day I spent on the Game (2-6 Hours / Day) nowadays I tend to include alot more in one "Day" so you actually see some Progress happening.
I do know that I  already spent more than 1.000 Hours on the Project according to recording times, Streams and Playtime in Dreams.

Music
Samuel Kim Music:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kYX1XEVvvXU
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6N9SS6L0TDU
CJ:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-Rrkbe9j6ayIe6ylQAfLzA
https://soundcloud.com/mycjmusic

Avatar and related marks are owned by Viacom International Inc. This fan-created game is not endorsed by, sponsored by, or affiliated with Viacom/Nickelodeon.

Playlist with all Episodes:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLJAovkWkNSgt9zEuDlF5szTx_GlKh2R4T
FAQ/All Q&A Questions:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1v-PiYZ9-x0gmOtXtI_Fcav9cgHH2qVhTAe01pG_gNHI/edit#gid=0
Trello-Board with Roadmap and Progress:
https://trello.com/b/RSaUDSJ0/four-seasons-a-fan-created-avatar-game

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Discord: https://discord.gg/x4XyeS9

Website:
https://elcagaming.com/
